supportingMedia.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

exploit.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

description.value: CWE-1285 Improper Validation of Specified Index, Position, or Offset in Input

supportingMedia.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: Junos OS 19.1R3-S10, 19.2R3-S7, 19.4R3-S12, 20.2R3-S7, 20.4R3-S7, 21.1R3-S5, 21.2R3-S4, 21.3R3-S4, 21.4R3-S3, 22.1R3-S2, 22.2R3, 22.3R2, 22.3R3, 22.4R2, 23.1R1, and all subsequent releases.

solution.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: Junos OS 19.1R3-S10, 19.2R3-S7, 19.4R3-S12, 20.2R3-S7, 20.4R3-S7, 21.1R3-S5, 21.2R3-S4, 21.3R3-S4, 21.4R3-S3, 22.1R3-S2, 22.2R3, 22.3R2, 22.3R3, 22.4R2, 23.1R1, and all subsequent releases.

supportingMedia.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.

work_around.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.
